short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A picture says more than 1000 words! This extension allows you to easily search images and drop them into e.g. GMail, Facebook, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A picture is worth a thousand words!

Piccit makes it super easy to browse images and drop them into your browser. e.g. into gmail, Facebook, etc. It's so much more fun to communicate visually!!!
